body.p: Paragraph 4.30 of the 2018 Conceptual Framework states that if one party has an obligation to transfer an economic resource, it follows that another party (or parties) has a right to receive that economic resource. The Board decided that this statement would help entities to apply the definition of a liability because it may sometimes be easier to identify whether that other party (or parties) has a right than to identify whether the first party has an obligation.
